description: Defines when to offer AI support in GAS Admin

dashboard.welcomeMessage: Welcome to your GAS dashboard! This is your command center. Would you like a quick tour of what you can do here?

properties.welcomeMessage: This is where you manage your properties. I can help you understand property settings, import from your channel manager, or troubleshoot any issues.

connections.welcomeMessage: Connections link GAS to your booking system. Need help setting up Beds24 or another channel manager?

offers.welcomeMessage: Create special offers and manage pricing tiers here. I can explain how corporate pricing works or help you set up a promotion.

websites.welcomeMessage: Manage your GAS-powered websites here. Need help deploying a site or customizing your pages?

blog.welcomeMessage: Create AI-powered blog content for your property. Want me to explain how the blog ideas system works?

attractions.welcomeMessage: Add local attractions to help guests explore your area. I can help you find and add places of interest.

settings.welcomeMessage: Configure your account and system settings here. What would you like to adjust?

first-visit.message: Welcome to GAS! I'm here to help you get started. Would you like me to guide you through the setup process?

no-connections.message: I notice you haven't connected a channel manager yet. This is required to sync your properties and accept bookings. Would you like help setting this up?

no-properties.message: Your channel manager is connected but no properties have been imported yet. Would you like me to help you import your properties?

no-website.message: You have properties but no website yet. Would you like to create a beautiful booking website for your property?

connection-error.message: I see there's an issue with your channel manager connection. Let me help you troubleshoot this.

empty-blog.message: Your blog is empty! Blog posts help with SEO and guest engagement. Want me to help you generate some content ideas?

empty-attractions.message: No attractions yet! Adding local points of interest helps guests plan their stay. Shall I suggest some places near your property?

api-error.message: It looks like there was a connection issue. This is usually temporary. Would you like to try again or should I help troubleshoot?

auth-error.message: There seems to be an authentication issue. Your API key may need to be updated. Would you like help with this?

sync-error.message: The sync with your channel manager encountered an issue. Let me help you resolve this.

save-error.message: There was a problem saving your changes. This might be a temporary issue. Want to try again?

messages: Need any help? I'm here if you have questions!
Stuck on something? I can help guide you through it.
Feel free to ask me anything about GAS!

dashboard: What can I do from the dashboard?

connections: Where do I find my API key?

properties: How do I add a new property?

offers: How do I create a discount offer?
websites: How do I get a website?
Can I use my own domain?

Why isn't my site showing changes?
blog: How do I create a blog post?
attractions: How do I publish an attraction?
